articles.author: Lisa Kailai Han
articles.title: S&P 500 futures up slightly as investors weigh tech earnings and watch Trump Fed visit: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The S&P 500 rallied to a new record close on Wednesday afternoon following new developments on the tariff front.
articles.content: S&P 500 futures were little changed early Thursday as Big Tech companies reported a mixed bag of earnings Wednesday and investors again turned their attention to the ongoing feud between Presiden… [+2486 chars]
